name: Bailiff service unsuccessful
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

The court bailiff tried to 'serve' the ((isDivorce??divorce papers))((isDissolution??papers to end your civil partnership)) at the address you provided. Unfortunately the bailiff was unsuccessful and so your ((partner)) has still not been served. 

Sign into your account to see what you can do next to progress your ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)): ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Update: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
